Summary Note:
The RM is Guillaume Marchand Robert's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
Having worked for over 34 years, Guillaume Marchand Robert brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Guillaume Marchand Robert and  Joséphine tied the knot in 1996. Their child is  named Ingrid.
Education Background:
In 1984, Guillaume finished his secondary school education at Lycée Camille Claudel.
Guillaume completed his university education at American Graduate School of Business in Paris in 1991.
Moreover he completed his extra university education at Skema Business School in 1995.
Occupation History:
Guillaume Marchand Robert is a 58 year old Billionaire Investor from France.
Guillaume Marchand Robert's first role was as a Investment Banker at Natixis S.A., where he worked diligently from 1991 to 1994 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, he took on the role of Private Equity Investor at BNP Paribas S.A. in 1995, further expanding his skill set.
From 1999 to 2002, he served as a Hedge Fund Manager at Natixis S.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
He worked as a Venture Capitalist at BNP Paribas S.A. from 2004 to 2008, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Since joining Société Générale S.A. as a Billionaire Investor in 2009, he has established himself as a respected authority, fostering collaboration and pushing boundaries to achieve groundbreaking results.
Wealth Summary:
During his work, he focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 780000 EUR.
He owns townhouse in Bordeaux, where he resides. It is worth 1552000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Nantes worth 3120000 EUR.

In 2011, he received an inheritance of 4020000 EUR from his late grandfather, who was a prominent Stock Trader, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
